subject: Communication
title: Social Media Rhetoric: Virality Over Truth
description: Learn Social Media Rhetoric: Virality Over Truth in one minute.

hook.text: A 280-character tweet destroyed a career. A meme changed an election.

buildup.text: Social media rhetoric prioritizes brevity, emotion, and shareability. Nuance and complexity are punished by algorithms.

discovery.text: The most viral content uses: moral outrage (3x more shares), in-group/out-group framing, and oversimplified binary.

climax.text: The antidote: slow down. The most important skill on social media isn't posting â€” it's pausing before reacting.

punchline.text: If a post makes you furious, that's the rhetoric working. Pause before it wins.
